main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Chicago with a report detailing its characteristics and behavior.
interesting points: The object was described as round, silvery, and the size of a golf ball at arm's length,It had a light on the rear that blinked on and off at random intervals during the sighting,The object moved in a straight line and exhibited side to side and up and down motions,The length of the observation was approximately 15 minutes,Several witnesses from different reports described varying shapes and colors of UFOs in different locations.
witness description: Lieutenant Lawrence Conter, United States Air Force
